author: Kim Lyons
title: Amazon using thermal cameras at some warehouses to scan workers for fevers
description: Amazon is now using thermal cameras at its warehouses to help screen workers for fevers, The cameras are faster to use than the standard forehead thermometers Amazon had been using to test workers for fevers, which are a primary symptom of the coronavirus.
content:
The company says the cameras will create a more streamlined experience
